title: 3.4 Master Challenge 1
question: Make custom blocks to draw a square, a rectangle, and any other polygon. Program a sprite to draw the shapes one after the other at random positions. Use custommade blocks in the main program.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
